item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, March 19, 2025 at 1:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Make Ubuntu packages 90% faster by rebuilding them (70 points | 44 comments)
2. Two new PebbleOS watches (1010 points | 352 comments)
3. Apple restricts Pebble from being awesome with iPhones (1125 points | 728 comments)

5. Would You Rather Have Married Young? (30 points | 15 comments)

29. SheepIt Render Farm server code goes open source (132 points | 19 comments)
